item.title: Kealan add a quote by John Connolly
item.description: "For in every adult there dwells the child that was, and in every child there lies the adult that will be." -- John Connolly

item.title: Kealan add a quote by John Connolly
item.description: "Being scared isn't the problem. It's not running away that's the hard part." -- John Connolly

item.title: Kealan add a quote by Agatha Christie
item.description: "It is a curious thought, but it is only when you see people looking ridiculous that you realize just how much you love them. " -- Agatha Christie

item.title: Kealan add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "Remember: the time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself. Life's cruelest irony." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Kealan add a quote by Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings
item.description: "Somewhere beyond the sink-hole, past the magnolia, under the live oaks, a boy and a yearling ran side by side, and were gone forever." -- Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings

item.title: Kealan add a quote by Danielle Rohr
item.description: "We don't speak of it, or react to it. Paralyzed in a reality of uncertainty and madness,this is where we are." -- Danielle Rohr

item.title: Kealan add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "Whoever you are, go out into the evening, leaving your room, of which you know every bit; your house is the last before the infinite, whoever you are." -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Kealan add a quote by Louis Menand
item.description: "Quotable quotes are coins rubbed smooth by circulation." -- Louis Menand
